summary: A requirements meeting was started by client Sarah. The PM asked for a project name; other roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide comments.

actions.task: Confirm and finalize the project name with client Sarah and the team

risks.risk: Project name remains undecided, causing ambiguity in requirements, documentation, and tracking
risks.mitigation: Assign an owner to confirm the name promptly; use a clear temporary identifier in backlog items until the name is finalized
